Newcastle-under-Stinks!ü§¢ü§Æüò∑ü§Æü§¢ It stinks every evening in Milehouse now it‚Äôs a bloody joke! #StopTheStink @NewsNBC @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe

@Young_Nudger @EnvAgencyYNE @EnvAgency @RSPB_OldMoor @JamesBevanEA @johncurtinEA @EmmaHowardBoyd The reservoir basin is on a tenancy agreement with @RSPB_OldMoor - they‚Äôre managing biodiversity here on our behalf. Concerns with the work should be passed to RSPB as the client.

tweets.text:
Going to the beach this #BankHoliday weekend? 

On some days, water quality might be low because of rainfall, wind and high tides. 

You can check the water quality before you head out at https://t.co/1uiKhnztLS https://t.co/Q6xqQ4PezM

What if I told you there was a single intervention we could deliver in our cities that would cool them during heatwaves, reduce flooding, scrub pollutants from the air, boost biodiversity, improve public health, and even reduce crime? You wouldn't believe me. But it's true. https://t.co/W1KWm6RHFk

@EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @DrMariaNeira @antheaturner @JuliaBradbury @mwilliamsthomas 

The annoyance level for hydrogen sulphide (h2s) is 7 ugm3. 

Would anyone at the EA like to comment on why we are seeing figures as high as 1017 ugm3. 

#StopTheStink https://t.co/G4jobNaxsi

So, @EnvAgency can‚Äôt legally suspend operations at the toxic @RedIndustries2 landfill because it‚Äôs not the new waste that‚Äôs the problem (yet). But they have also reported 10 permit breaches this year https://t.co/XClLWJugXR, so surely that‚Äôs grounds for suspension? #stopthestink https://t.co/RD6b3Hg0jX https://t.co/6YcmBzhhQx

Eventually @EnvAgency have approved the @AffinityWater application on 21 May 2021, almost 2 years, the EA will say this shows they looked into the details, we would argue that they put off making the decision until after they approved the HS2 tunnelling to avoid public debate.

urls.description: For miles around Walleys Quarry near Newcastle-under-Lyme, people have reported waking up in the night struggling to breathe

urls.title: Petition: Give the Environment Agency the funds and freedom to protect English rivers
urls.description: The Government must reverse years of cuts to Agency budgets, increase charges for polluters, and give the Agency freedom from overly business-friendly Government codes and guidance, so it can pursue and achieve its principal statutory objective to protect and enhance English rivers

tweets.text:
Wild fish and their waters need your help. We have launched a Parliamentary Petition to give @EnvAgency the funds and freedom they need to protect English rivers. Please sign and share our petition to give rivers a fighting chance. #standingupforrivers
